text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews You know it was to quickly. And everyone with a brain can check the statistics. Compare it to other countries like Austria. It is still closed mostly everything in Austria despite low new cases. https://t.co/a98auMH2lD . it is a shame where is your brain? AMERICANS WAKE UP!
